name: LAST/BEST
description:
Only nine cities have survived the relentless waves of KAIJU attacks.

In the final bunker of humanity, the remaining nuclear weaponry is primed and ready to detonate, hooked up to the final doomsday device- the LAST/BEST Missile Strike Targeting System.

Fire NUCLEAR STRIKES against the KAIJU hordes and protect the remaining cities- but BEWARE: each bomb that strikes a city leaves blood on your hands.

GET READY.

Prepare your GAME BOY™.

You are the LAST/BEST HOPE FOR HUMANITY.

---

Made for #GBJAM 5
